channel.title: Can you take advantage of the security benefits of Boot Clock Randomization even when sdwdate is disabled?
channel.description:
Hello,
Can you take advantage of the security benefits of Boot Clock Randomization even when sdwdate is disabled?
Any Help would be appreciated.

item.title: Can you take advantage of the security benefits of Boot Clock Randomization even when sdwdate is disabled?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Yes, because these are completely separate packages.

Read full topic
